channel.title: When will Throne of Lies support Linux again?
channel.description: Title says all, "When will Throne of Lies support Linux again?"

item.title: When will Throne of Lies support Linux again?
item.dc:creator: anon97870008
item.description:
Mac/linux support was dropped after a security update recently.
There are some proposed workarounds like Wine or dualboot, for this join the discord and ask a mod to add you to the mac-linux role, so you can see #mac-linux-workarounds
Linux has a chance to return in the future some day, but definitely not before the V 2.4 patch.

Read full topic
item.source: When will Throne of Lies support Linux again?
